concepts.CORNEAL_TOPOGRAPHY_4_DESC: Maps the curvature and shape of the cornea's surface
concepts.FLUORESCEIN_FUNDUS_ANGIOGRAPHY (FFA)_10_: Highlights blood vessels in the retina and choroid.
concepts.B_SCAN_2_DESC: Produce a two-dimensional cross-sectional image of the eye and the orbit.
concepts.RETINAL_PHOTOGRAPHY_9_DESC: Captures detailed images of the retina,
concepts.VISUAL_FIELD_EXAMINATION_WITH_HUMPHREY_V: Assesses the full horizontal and vertical range of a person's vision.
concepts.OPTIC_NERVE_HEAD_OPTICAL_COHERENCE_TOMOG: Optic Nerve Head Optical Coherence Tomography(Optic Nerve Head OCT)
Provides imaging of the optic nerve head and the retinal nerve fiber layer
concepts.OPTICAL_COHERENCE_TOMOGRAPHY_ANGIOGRAPHY: Visualizes blood flow in the retina and choroid
concepts.VISUAL_FIELD_EXAMINATION_WITH_HUMPHREY_V: Visual field Examination with Humphrey Visual Field Analyser
concepts.ANTERIOR_SEGMENT_OPTICAL_COHERENCE_TOMOG: Cross-sectional images of the anterior segment of the eye
